articles.title: What went wrong with Trump's 'salute' to ICE, Customs and Border Patrol
articles.description: If the White House wants to salute these public officials, fine. But there's an important difference between honoring a group of people and lying to them.

articles.description: President Trump's attorney accuses the special counsel of trying to run the Russia investigation into the midterm elections on 'The Story.'

articles.title: Time is running out to secure our elections

articles.title: As deficit grows, GOP leaders eye cuts to Medicare, Social Security
